title: [Large-scale] Teacher-Led Instructional Method Development Based on School Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational pedagogy and general awareness of school organizational structures
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning environment utilizing LMS in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four core elements (learning, feedback, development, evolution) that constitute the school organizational learning model
Learners can apply three organizational learning strategies using a teacher-led approach to actual school contexts
Learners can suggest ways to build a community of practice through online discussion designs that promote collaboration among learners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
